analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/4/0xe30e02f049957e2a5907589e06ba646fb2c321ba.sol:
	Contract DRPUToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/4/0xe30e02f049957e2a5907589e06ba646fb2c321ba.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

TokenRetriever.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xe30e02f049957e2a5907589e06ba646fb2c321ba.sol#205-221) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenInstance.transfer(msg.sender,tokenBalance) (/unique_chucks/4/0xe30e02f049957e2a5907589e06ba646fb2c321ba.sol#216-219)
Token.standard should be constant (/unique_chucks/4/0xe30e02f049957e2a5907589e06ba646fb2c321ba.sol#486)
